# Global Node.js packages for BillyBot on Jetson Orin NX
# Install with: npm install -g $(cat npm-packages.txt)

# Core tools
pm2@latest
nodemon@latest

# Development tools
eslint@latest
prettier@latest

# Build tools
webpack@latest
webpack-cli@latest

# Testing
jest@latest
mocha@latest

# Utilities
http-server@latest
serve@latest

# Clawdbot (main package)
clawdbot@latest
